org.miloss.fgsms.agentcore

Class PolicyFetch

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.miloss.fgsms.agentcore.HelperBase
      • org.miloss.fgsms.agentcore.PolicyFetch

  • public class PolicyFetch
extends HelperBase
    Provides some useful functions for building agents.. All functions use the fgsms-agent.properties file within this JAR for configuration purposes All functions support discovery mechanisms, retry counts, failover/roundrobin
    Author:
    AO

      • TryFetchGlobalPolicy

        public static org.miloss.fgsms.services.interfaces.policyconfiguration.GlobalPolicy TryFetchGlobalPolicy()
                                                                                                  throws ConfigurationException
        * Attempts to retrieve the current global policy from the fgsms server A successful return typically indicates that the server is up and running.
        Returns:
        A non-null global policy if successful. Null if not successful
        Throws:
        ConfigurationException
        Since:
        6.3

      • TryFetchPolicy

        public static org.miloss.fgsms.services.interfaces.policyconfiguration.ServicePolicy TryFetchPolicy(String URI,
                                                                                    org.miloss.fgsms.services.interfaces.common.PolicyType policyType,
                                                                                    String domainname,
                                                                                    String hostname)
                                                                                             throws ConfigurationException
        Gets a service policy from the fgsms server under the context of the an agent meaning that if the policy does not exist, it will be created. Will use discovery and retry logic if configured for it.
